name: The Answer is Yes (EGD Version)
description:
*WARNING: The dialogue insults, gaslights, and falsely condemns readers and violence against the reader is implied — keep this under advisement if you decide to run the game (and please don't run it if you aren't ok with all of that).

However you respond, it makes no difference.  Your interrogator has no interest in what you have to say.  You were condemned from the very moment you stepped into the room.  

  • Listen to questions asked in text-to-speech
  • Hold the space bar while you speak into your microphone
  • Respond to yes/no questions using your voice
  • Try to avoid condemnation (you can't)

**This game uses your microphone to respond to speech input.

—+——+——+—

This is a college project and a work in progress.

Features to be added -

  • More animation
  • More dialogue variations
  • A more developed story
  • An alternative ("good") ending
  • Typing support (alternative to default speech-to-text)
  • Browser version (if possible)
